Office
Cover available:
>All types of clerical and administration business >General contents (fixtures and fittings) >Computer cover >Public Liability – cover yourself for damage to property or injury to others >Employers Liability – cover as required by the law >Electronic business equipment (e.g. tills) >Buildings insurance available (inc listed buildings) >Contents cover >Glass cover >Goods in Transit >Tenants Improvements >Money >Work away extension to include collection and delivery >Legal Protection >Business Interruption >Accidental damage
quote now
Recieve a personal and detailed quote from a team member
Quote Buster!
We will do our best to beat any quote you have recieved for the same policy
Commercial Insurance packages tailored for your business needs
As one of the country's largest independently owned groups of insurance brokers, we have formed excellent relationships with many of the UK's leading insurance companies, so we can get the right cover at the right prices. We can tailor bespoke insurance polices which will give you complete cover.

© Coversure Insurance Services (Hyde) 2011
Macci Ltd t/as Coversure Insurance Services (Hyde) is authorised and regulated by the Financial Services Authority. Ref: 307594.
Coversure Hyde offers Insurance Products to the Greater Manchester area covering towns including Failsworth, Stockport, Bredbury, Droylsden, Cheadle Hulme, Wilmslow, Hazel Grove, Stalybridge, Glossop, Skelton, Hackthorpe, Ashton under Lyne, Droylsden, Stalybridge, Denton, Glossop, Stockport, Wilmslow, and Hyde.
Coversure Insurance Hyde
118 Market Street, Hyde, Cheshire SK14 1EX
